Title: Consolidate the dictatorship of the proletariat and consolidate the unity of the international proletariat!
Designer: Central Academy of Industrial Art and Design (中央工艺美术学院)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: Workers representing different peoples, arm in arm before a globe dominated by the hammer-and-sickle emblem of the Communist movement, and a red flag with the portraits of Lenin and Marx. We assume the worker in the center is a Russian, the Black worker is African American or African.
